movie.name: Fight Club
movie.review: An excellent movie, with a shocking and memorable conclusion. Acting was excellent by Pitt and Norton as well as the entire cast. Look forward to getting mindblown

movie.name: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
movie.review: Spectacular action movie, excellent fight scenes, well casted. The ending was disappointing to say the least. The fights should have been longer. Good effort, but too much was attempted and pushed into one movie. The soundtrack was superb and fit very well regardless.

movie.name: A Beautiful Mind
movie.review: A truly excellent movie, with an unbelievable shocking finish. The movie starts off a bit slow, but has intensive highs. Also, a greatly inspiring movie about the Nobel Prize winner, John Nash

movie.name: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
movie.review: The soundtrack for this movie was absolutely amazing, the plot was spot on great. This is a movie that proves too many superheroes aren't needed it make an excellent movie. There were great humour moments, but the action and twists were a nice surprise, and really exceeded expectations

movie.name: The Tale of Despereaux
movie.review: A great family movie, Despereaux was an fantastic and adorable protagonist. The movie was funny and just an overall fun movie with great graphics. The movie doesn't provide anything extraordinary but is a nice movie with great voice acting nonetheless.

movie.name: Interstellar
movie.review: A complete masterpiece! Truly deserving of its rating. The movie's premise is thoughtprovoking and overall astonishing. The story, the details that connect, and the overall dark atmosphere with a hint of hope make it the masterpiece, and not to mention their spectacular soundtrack and perfect casting to compliment it.

movie.name: The Martian
movie.review: A much more playful take on the idea of being stranded out in space. Movies don't always have to be dark to be good! Damon was excellent, funny, and a realistic character. There were intense moments as well, but the movie was fairly scientifically accurate and is just overall a great experience

movie.name: Guardians of the Galaxy
movie.review: A truly amazing movie! It had action, comedy, unique music choices that were risky but paid off. The movie was excellent plot wise especially the team recruitment. The fights were great, with a sense of Marvel signature humour at its finest. Easily one of the best Marvel movies and summer movies to have come out at the time

movie.name: How to Train Your Dragon
movie.review: An excellent family movie with great storyline, main character, unique variety of supporting characters, clever time frame,  astonishing sountrack, and fantastic animations make this movie one of the best animated movies out there
